issues.economy: And they're still making the wrong decisions now by committing to immediate cuts which threaten to choke off the recovery.
issues.health: Why won't the Tories guarantee your right to see a cancer specialist within two weeks of GP referral?
issues.socialWelfare: Why would the Tories choose to cut Child Tax Credits and Child Trust Funds and instead give a Â£200,000 tax break to each of the 3,000 wealthiest estates in the country?

images.caption: Take a long hard look at the Tories

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet is critical of the Tories' policies and decisions, questioning their approach to health care and social welfare, and suggesting that their financial decisions are not conducive to economic recovery.
